17-L: Cutting diplomatic ties should be avoided unless no other diplomatic options remain viable.

18-R: Tactical nuclear strikes are massively disproportionate and would lead to severe international condemnation and escalation.

19-Q: A full invasion would lead to massive loss of life, significant geopolitical upheaval, and likely global conflict, the least reasonable course of action.
